name: Perform a domain search  with Icypeas (single)
description:
This template can be used to scan a domain/company with Icypeas. Be sure to have an active account to use this template. 



How it works
This workflow can be divided into three steps :
The workflow initiates with a manual trigger (On clicking 'execute').
It connects to your Icypeas account.
It performs an HTTP request to scan a domain/company name.

Set up steps
You will need a working icypeas account to run the workflow and get your API Key, API Secret and User ID.
You will need a domain/company name to perform the search.
